title: Group portrait of young women and men posed around stairs, including Harriet McGruder, Barbara Garnett, Barbara Mills, James Boddy, Richard Harrison, Magarette Richards, Richard Holland, Yolanda Harris, Dennis and Donald Smalley, Dorothy Graves, Ronald Nowlin, Bernard Duse, Agnes Mason, Bernice VeLar, Donna Drake, Claude Morris, Marlene Chick, Francine Wise, Audrey Wells, Joyce Addaway, and Nelson Harrison, for Westinghouse High School graduation party at Nelson Harrison's house
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
